doc_context:
path /v3/offchain/ethereum/erc20/transfer
opid ethtransfererc20
params None
sum send ethereum erc20 tokens from a virtual account to the blockchain
reqBody
oneof
type object
props
senderaccountid
maxlength 24
minlength 24
desc sender account id
type string
address
maxlength 42
minlength 42
desc blockchain address to send erc20 token to
type string
amount
desc amount to be sent
maxlength 38
pattern ddd
type string
compliant
desc compliance check if withdrawal is not compliant it will not be processed
type boolean
gaslimit
type string
desc gas limit for transaction in gas price if not set automatic calculation will be used
pattern d
gasprice
type string
desc gas price in gwei if not set automatic calculation will be used
pattern d
privatekey
type string
maxlength 66
minlength 66
desc private key of sender address either mnemonic and index privatekey or signature id must be present  depends on the type of account and xpub
nonce
type number
minimum 0
desc the nonce to be set to the transaction if not present the last known nonce will be used
paymentid
desc identifier of the payment shown for created transaction within tatum sender account
maxlength 100
minlength 1
type string
sendernote
maxlength 500
minlength 1
desc note visible to owner of withdrawing account
type string
required
senderaccountid
address
privatekey
amount

path /v3/offchain/ethereum/erc20/deploy
opid ethdeployerc20
sum deploy an ethereum erc20 smart contract to the blockchain and a virtual account
message endpoint spec too long see https//apidoctatumio/tag/Blockchain operations/#operation/ethdeployerc20 for more info
